page.title: 02LOCAL ISSUES (1)
page.content: {SEWAGE SCHEME} In the past people in Hartshorne haven't been able to build more houses because there weren't any sewage pipes to carry the sewage away. Now they are putting new sewage pipes along Repton Road and Dunsmore Lane. It will take at least a year. Then they might build new houses. There would be more children to make friends with. They could build a cafe, or a discotheque or an adventure playground. We need some more clubs in the village; a sports club for the kids and a club for the elderly people so they can get together and enjoy themselves. However, if they build more estates, it will be even noisier. There would be less farm land and fewer footpaths. We wouldn't feel that we were living in a country village.
